summary: With her parents dead, an already unstable teenager embarks on a blood-soaked journey of torture, violence, and retribution, as everyone unlucky enough to cross paths with her ends up dead. Is the brutal Sick Girl capable of mercy?
cast: Leslie Andrews|John McGarr|Charlie Trepany|Ian Villalobos|Katherine Macanufo|Graham Denman|Stephen Geoffreys|Chris W. King|Sean Slattery|Justin Marco|Peter Partida Jr.|Caerley Hill|Andy Signore|Teresa Marco|Jaimie Beebe|Shari Gulley|Lisa Goldman|Jennie Carlino|Erik Fig|Aleece Jones|Aimee Mossa|Jo Pratta|Matt Sigloch
title: Sick Girl
